ee sandaha ohu waya kala mudala amerikanu dolar miliyana 32 ki. 2002 wasaredi dakunu api්rakanu jathikayek dina ekolahak da, 2005 wasaredi yalith amarikanu jathikayek dina ekolahak da bagin abhyawakashaye sancharaya kalaha. 2006 wasaredi irana - amarikanu jathikayek dina 12 k abhyawakashaye randi sitiyeya.pasugiya wasare sapthambar 30 sita okthobar 11 dakwa dina 12 k abhyawakashaye sancharaya kala kanada jathikayagen pasu thawama kisiwaku pruthiwiyen iwathata sancharaya pinisa nikma gos natha.abhyawakasha hotala atharin matha kalayedi wadima janapi්rayathwayak sahithawa indiwu warjin galaktik sabawinma aakarshaniya sancharaka nikethanayak we.danata ehi nirmathruwarun pawasa aththe thama abhyawakasha hotalaye ek dinak gatha kirimata waya wanu aththe dolar 20000 bawayi.

ohuge muthun miththan 1818 wellasse karallen pasuwa ingrisin gen beri aa udarata sinhala janathawayi.eda patan siyawas gananawak mululle panampaththuwe kumana maha wanantharaya asure jiwath wu me sinhalayan okanda dewalaye bharakarathwaya daramin ehi puda puja pawathwagena enawa.gam bim aaraksha wenta, kethwathu sarusara wenta, satha sipawagen bawa bhoga aaraksha wenta, daru pala labennata leda roga uwaduruwalin duruwenta wani kudu mahath duk gini niwa gannata katharagama dewindunge pihita pathana bathimathun dahas sankhyawak okanda dewasthanaye pihita patha ena bawa muthubanda mahaththaya kiyanawa.mas mansha kala math pan bila mala gewal, kotahalu kiliwalata wadun geyi kiliwalata ahuwela kisi kenek okanda dewalayata paya thiyanne na.mas mansha, mathpan aadiyen walakila pewela bhakthiyen ehi paminena kawara bathimathakuge wuwath kannalawwakata kanda surindunge pihitarakshawa labena bawayi muthu banda mahaththaya kiyanne.dewolata pitu pasin wishala bhumi pradeshayak wasa pathirunu maha kalugal thalawa matha idi kala walli matha dewalayath kuda katharagama dewalath ehi piwisena kawarakuge hadawathakata wuwath shanthiyak gena denawa nisakayi.awata parisaraye randunu guda nihandathawa bindimin warin wara bindi yana rala gediwala ghoshawa uswa nangi enawa.
